summary: An ordinance relating to the acquisition of Lots 8, 9 and 10, Block 3, and Lots 1, 2 and 3, Block 4, Pleasant Valley Garden Tracts Addition for park and playground purposes (Magnolia Playfield) under Ordinance No. 78612, King County Superior Court Cause No. 416813; accepting the condemnation awards therein and making an appropriation from the Seattle Park Bonds 1948 Fund in connection therewith.
committee: Finance and Parks and Public Grounds
